snippet.title: Season 0 Update Overview | Arena Breakout: Infinite
snippet.description: A warm greeting to all players gearing up for our game on August 13. We’re excited to launch our Update Overview series, which will highlight the new content in each season update. Our first video, focusing on Season 0, is coming soon. Set your alarms!
